definitions.name: Smart Contract Development & Toolchains
definitions.description: Tools for writing, compiling, formatting, and deploying smart contracts.

definitions.name: Security, Testing & Formal Verification
definitions.description: Tools dedicated to testing, auditing, vulnerability detection, and ensuring contract correctness.

definitions.name: Client Libraries & SDKs
definitions.description: Libraries and frameworks for building dApp UIs, connecting wallets, and managing client-side contract interaction.

definitions.name: Oracles, Data, & Analytics
definitions.description: Tools for reading, indexing, monitoring, and visualizing onchain data and state changes.

definitions.name: Transaction & Wallet Infrastructure
definitions.description: Core services and libraries for creating, signing, bundling, and managing transactions, often involving Account Abstraction (AA).

definitions.name: Cross-Chain & Interoperability
definitions.description: Solutions enabling multi-chain asset transfers, contract interactions, and generalized cross-chain messaging.

definitions.name: Education & Community Resources
definitions.description: Learning platforms, security guidelines, and open standards for better developer collaboration.

definitions.name: Agent Tooling
definitions.description: MCP servers, agent skills, and tools that enable agentic workflows to interact with Ethereum.
